description: Need a shirt that’s nice yet casual? Sharp yet comfortable? Our Men’s Printed Short Sleeve Button Down can tick all the boxes. With the uncontested style of a button down paired with the comfort of four-way stretch-woven fabric and breathable Merino Sport underarm panels all in an engaging print, this shirt can take you from afternoon hike to night on the town with ease. For everyday versatility, look no further.
name: Smartwool Everyday SS Button Down - Mens
